mapper.select: SELECT a.no, a.id, a.code, a.count, a.time, b.img, b.supportpereat, b.calory, b.carbo, b.protein, b.fat, b.sugar, b.natrium, b.chole, b.fattyacid, b.transfat FROM user_intake a JOIN food b ON a.code = b.code WHERE a.id = #{id} and a.time LIKE '${time}%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_intake (id, code, count) VALUES (#{id}, #{code}, #{count})
